# The `MemoryDependenceAnalysis` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An analysis that produces <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydependenceresults">MemoryDependenceResults</a></code> for a function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An analysis that produces <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydependenceresults">MemoryDependenceResults</a></code> for a function.

This is essentially a no-op because the results are computed entirely lazily.

Definition at line 513 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorydependenceanalysis-h">MemoryDependenceAnalysis.h</a>.
